CustomField.description:
This field is to store the fixed payment amount that is applicable when the "LOC Fixed payment Type" has the following picklist values
1) Fixed Amount + accrued interest 2) Fixed Amount 3) Fixed Amount per $1000 of outstanding balance 4) Fixed fraction of outstanding principal balance + accrued interest 5) Greater of fixed amount or accrued interest
CustomField.label: LOC Fixed Payment Amount
